Package dataAccess

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.DataAccess
public class DataAccess extends Object
This class implements the Data Access utility to the objectDb database

  • Method Details

    • initializeDB

      public void initializeDB()
      It initializes the database with some trial events and questions It is invoked by the business logic layer when the option "initialize" is used in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file

    • createEvent

      public Event createEvent(String description, Date date, String country) throws EventAlreadyExistException
      It creates an event in the database
      Parameters:
      description - an instance of description
      date - an instance of date
      Returns:
      it returns an event
      Throws:
      EventAlreadyExistException - if the event already exists

    • createQuestion

      public Question createQuestion(Event event, String question, float betMinimum) throws QuestionAlreadyExist
      It creates a question for an event with a question text and the minimum bet
      Parameters:
      event - an instance of the event to which the question is added
      question - an instance of the question text
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      it returns the question created, null or an exception
      Throws:
      QuestionAlreadyExist - the same question already exists for the event

    • getEvents

      public List<Event> getEvents(Date date)
      It retrieves from the database the events of a given date
      Parameters:
      date - an instance of date
      Returns:
      collection of events

    • getQuestions

      public List<Question> getQuestions(Event event)

    • addForecast

      public Forecast addForecast(Question question, String result, double fee) throws ForecastAlreadyExistException
      It inserts the given forecast in the database
      Parameters:
      question - an instance of the question of the forecast
      result - result of the forecast
      fee - fee of the forecast
      Throws:
      ForecastAlreadyExistException - if the forecast already exists

    • checkLogin

      public boolean checkLogin(String username, String password)
      It checks the login utility with a given username and password to grant access
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of username
      password - an instance of password
      Returns:
      access granted or not!

    • getEventsMonth

      public Vector<Date> getEventsMonth(Date date)
      It retrieves from the database the dates in a month for which there are events
      Parameters:
      date - date of the month for which days with events want to be retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of dates

    • getEventsCountry

      public List<Event> getEventsCountry(String country)
      Retrieves from the database all the events taking place in the given country.
      Parameters:
      country - the country where events take place
      Returns:
      all the events taking place in the given country

      initializeMode - initialize mode of the database

    • register

      public User register(String username, String firstName, String lastName, String address, String email, byte[] hashedPassword, Date birthdate, byte[] salt, Long cardNumber, Date expirationDate, Integer securityCode) throws CreditCardAlreadyExists
      It registers a new user with standard permits
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of username
      firstName - an instance of the first name of the user
      lastName - an instance of the last name of the user
      address - current bill home address
      email - email of a given user
      hashedPassword - hashed password
      birthdate - birthday date of the user
      salt - salt used in password hashing
      Throws:
      CreditCardAlreadyExists

    • isUserInDB

      public boolean isUserInDB(String username)
      It returns true if the username is already in the database
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of username
      Returns:
      it returns true if the username is already in the database

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String username) throws UserNotFoundException
      Returns the user with the username passed by parameter.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the username passed by parameter.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist

    • depositMoney

      public void depositMoney(double amount, User user) throws NotEnoughMoneyInWalletException
      Throws:
      NotEnoughMoneyInWalletException

    • getBet

      public Bet getBet(User gambler, Forecast userForecast)
      Returns the single possible bet for a given gambler and the gambler's forecast.
      Parameters:
      gambler - The user to get the bet from.
      userForecast - The forecast where the user has bet.
      Returns:
      The single bet placed by the user if a bet was placed, NULL otherwise.

    • setBet

      public boolean setBet(float betAmount, Forecast forecast, User gambler) throws BetAlreadyExistsException, LateBetException, LiquidityLackException, MinBetException
      Persists a new bet for the given gambler, in the selected forecast.
      Parameters:
      betAmount - Amount of money bet by the gambler.
      forecast - The forecast linked with the bet.
      gambler - The user who places the bet.
      Returns:
      true if the persistence has been successful.
      Throws:
      BetAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the gambler already had placed a bet in the same forecast.
      LateBetException - Thrown if the gambler tries to place a bet an hour before on the event associated with the forecast.
      LiquidityLackException - Thrown when gambler bets not having enough liquidity access to account for it.
      MinBetException - Exception for when user inserts less fee than required.

    • close

      public void close()
      It closes the database
